title: Facebook page feed subscription and page access token
body:
I have created one question today but I still have some problems with subscriptions. I can't get page feed in real-time api. I'm doing this steps below.

1) I have created application.
2) I have created page.
3) I have attached page to application in settings page.
4) I have enabled webhook product and enabled callback url for Page object, then I have subscribed to feed field.
5) I have been adding new posts to my page.

And I have no signal on my webpage with callback url. Someone before told me that I should specify page access token, but, where I can specify page access token to subscription?

What I'm doing wrong?

Thanks for help.
